content:
Yes, there are repetitions in the following research questions:

* Questions 1 and 2 cover similar ground in terms of how nativist literature contributes to negative attitudes towards immigrant communities.
* Questions 9-12 are a repeat of questions 13-16, covering the same topic of how Jean Raspail, Michel Houellebecq, and Bruce Bawer construct a nativist vision of Europe and its implications.

To avoid repetition, the researcher could consider combining or condensing similar questions into a more concise and focused set of research questions.
